UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Novel Broad-Spectrum Antimicrobial Peptide Derived from Anoplin and Its Activity on Bacterial Pneumonia in Mice.
Literature.Author: Gou S, Li B, Ouyang X, Ba Z, Zhong C, Zhang T, Chang L, Zhu Y, Zhang J, Zhu N, Zhang Y, Liu H, Ni J

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=102.54 µM,Human glomerular mesangial cells (GMC):IC50=25.17 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=4µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 23857(MIC=8µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=16µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=8µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=4µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=8µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=8µM)
